attributes.action: Ban companies from sending all their call centre work oversea's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am sure I am not the only one who is frustrated that they call their "British" company (Bank, telephone, utilities etc), only to get diverted somewhere abroad where you speak to someone who barely understands English let alone speak it and they know little of the enquiry you are asking about. Please let's bring call centres back to the U.K where they belong.
